TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ContextDataSource extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource

Docs.summary: Represents a base class for data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource> class is a base class that can be used to create any data source control that supports the Entity Framework, LINQ-to-SQL, [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Services, or other data provider. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource> class is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource>. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource> class provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property that represents the context type that the data source control works with. For example, the context type for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> class is the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ContextTypeName { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.
Docs.value: The name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.
Docs.value: The name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string EntityTypeName { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
Docs.value: The name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
